detectors.description:
BitDefi.returnRate() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitDefi.sol#114-119) uses the other parameters of block for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.number < heightEnd20Percent (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitDefi.sol#115)
	- block.number >= heightEnd20Percent && block.number < heightEnd10Percent (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitDefi.sol#116)
	- block.number >= heightEnd10Percent && block.number < heightEnd05Percent (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitDefi.sol#117)
	- block.number >= heightEnd05Percent (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitDefi.sol#118)
